trans-unit.source: mcculw is supported for Universal Library 6.55 and later. Some functions in the mcculw package may be unavailable with earlier versions of Universal Library. Visit http://www.mccdaq.com/Software-Downloads.aspx to upgrade your version of UL.
trans-unit.target: 通用库6.55和更高版本支持mcculw。 早期版本的通用库可能不提供mcculw软件包中的某些功能。访问 http://www.mccdaq.com/Software-Downloads.aspx升级您的UL版本。

trans-unit.source: mcculw supports CPython 2.7 and 3.4+.
mcculw supports only the Windows operating system.
About
Author
Bugs/Feature Requests
Contains a Python API for interacting with Measurement Computing’s Universal Library in Windows. See GitHub for the latest source.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于与Windows中Measurement Computing的通用库进行交互的Python API。请参阅GitHub以获取最新资源。

trans-unit.source: Documentation
Documentation is available in the Universal Library Help.
Download the examples zip file from the mcculw GitHub repository.
trans-unit.target: 从mcculw GitHub存储库下载示例zip文件。

trans-unit.source: Examples
Info
Install Python version 2.7, 3.4, or later from https://www.python.org/downloads/ .
Install the latest version of InstaCal from http://www.mccdaq.com/Software-Downloads.aspx .
Install the mcculw library by entering the following command:
Install the the MCC UL Python API for Windows (mcculw) and any dependencies using pip:
trans-unit.target: 使用pip安装MCC UL Python API for Windows (mcculw)和所有依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Installation
MCC Universal Library Python API for Windows
Measurement Computing

Note: If you get a message like “pip is not recognized as an internal or external command…”, or if you have multiple Python installations, enter the full path to the pip executable, such as C:\Python27\Scripts\pip install –upgrade pip or C:\Python27\Scripts\pip install mcculw. The pip command is in the Scripts subdirectory of your Python install location.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果收到诸如“ pip不被识别为内部或外部命令…”之类的消息，或者安装了多个Python，请输入pip可执行文件的完整路径，例如 C：\ Python27 \ Scripts \ pip install –升级pip或C：\ Python27 \ Scripts \ pip install mcculw。pip命令位于Python安装位置的Scripts子目录中。

trans-unit.source: Note: The mcculw examples included in version 1.0.0 and later are not backward compatible with pre-release versions of the mcculw Python package. See the Examples section for more details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：1.0.0及更高版本中包含的mcculw示例与mcculw Python软件包的预发行版本不向后兼容。有关更多详细信息，请参见示例部分。

trans-unit.source: Note: The latest examples take advantage of the mcculw.device_info subpackage added in version 1.0.0. Software developed using the props subpackage included in the examples folder of pre-release versions will continue to work with version 1.0.0 and later of the mcculw Python package, but requires the inclusion of the props subdirectory. See the mcculw GitHub Releases page for a complete archive of previous releases.
trans-unit.target: 注意：最新示例利用了1.0.0版中添加的mcculw.device_info子软件包。使用预发行版本的examples文件夹中包含的props子软件包开发的软件将继续与1.0.0版和mcculw Python软件包的更高版本一起使用，但需要包含props子目录。有关以前版本的完整存档，请参见mcculw GitHub版本页面。

trans-unit.source: Open the Windows command prompt: press Win+R, type cmd.exe and press Enter.
trans-unit.target: 打开Windows命令提示符:按Win+R,键入cmd.exe并按Enter键。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the knowledgebase article Importing Python for Windows example programs into an IDE for detailed instructions on how to import examples into popular IDEs such as Eclipse and Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将示例导入流行的IDE（例如Eclipse和Visual Studio）的详细说明，请参阅知识库文章“将Python for Windows示例程序导入IDE”中的详细说明。

trans-unit.source: Support/Feedback

The mcculw package contains an API (Application Programming Interface) for interacting with the I/O Library for Measurement Computing Data Acquisition products, Universal Library. This package was created and is supported by MCC. The package is implemented in Python as a wrapper around the Universal Library C API using the ctypes Python Library.
trans-unit.target: 该mcculw包中包含用于通用库中的I / O库Measurement Computing公司的数据采集产品，交互的API（应用编程接口）。此软件包已创建并受MCC支持。该软件包在Python中使用ctypes Python库作为通用库C API的包装器实现。

trans-unit.source: The mcculw package is available on GitHub and PyPI.
trans-unit.target: 该mcculw软件包可以在GitHub上和PyPI中。

trans-unit.source: The mcculw package is supported by MCC. For support for mcculw, contact technical support through http://www.mccdaq.com/Support.aspx . Please include version information for Python, Universal Library and the mcculw packages used as well as detailed steps on how to reproduce the problem in your request.
trans-unit.target: 该mcculw包由MCC支持。有关mcculw的支持，请通过http://www.mccdaq.com/Support.aspx与技术支持联系。请提供有关Python，通用库和使用的mcculw软件包的版本信息，以及有关如何在您的请求中重现该问题的详细步骤。
